name: .MONOSNIPPET
summary: Learn about .MONOSNIPPET files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a MONOSNIPPET file with Helftone Monodraw (Mac). To do so, open Monodraw and select the Templates menu from the app's right-hand sidebar. Then, click Manage. Drag your MONOSNIPPET file into the Finder window that appears to use it as a snippet.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .monosnippet file in Helftone Monodraw
images.caption: MONOSNIPPET file open in Helftone Monodraw
